item.title: 中国对酷狗直播电子商务展开调查
item.description: 中国市场监管部门正开始调查酷开科技旗下一家公司如何利用直播服务促进电子商务，这对一直在向在线销售领域扩张的流行视频服务来说是一个潜在的挫折。【原文：China’s market regulator is beginning a probe into a unit of Kuaishou Technology for how live-streaming services are used to promote e-commerce, a potential setback for the popular video service that has been expanding into online sales.】

item.title: 阿特金斯表示，美国证券交易委员会将全面修订投资者信息披露规则
item.description: 美国证券交易委员会（Securities and Exchange Commission）主席保罗-阿特金斯（Paul Atkins）周五表示，该委员会将继续推进全面修订上市公司投资者信息披露规则的计划。【原文：The Securities and Exchange Commission will move forward with plans to overhaul investor disclosure rules for publicly-traded companies, agency Chairman Paul Atkins said Friday.】

item.title: Altice International 债权人与华利安进行债务谈判
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，亿万富翁帕特里克-德雷希（Patrick Drahi）苦苦挣扎的电信帝国的一部分--阿尔迪斯国际公司（Altice International）的债权人已选择华利安公司（Houlihan Lokey）作为与该公司进行债务谈判的财务顾问。【原文：Creditors to Altice International, part of billionaire Patrick Drahi’s struggling telecommunications empire, have picked Houlihan Lokey as financial adviser for debt talks with the company, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: Ecopetrol 寻求巴西陆上交易，关注巴西国家石油公司集群
item.description: 哥伦比亚石油生产商 Ecopetrol SA 正在巴西寻求石油和天然气交易，其中可能包括巴西国家石油公司在巴伊亚州东北部的陆上油田群。【原文：Colombian oil producer Ecopetrol SA is pursuing oil and gas deals in Brazil that could include a cluster of onshore Petrobras fields in the northeastern state of Bahia.】

item.title: 国防公司 CSG 据称将增加银行参与 30 亿欧元的首次公开募股工作
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，国防制造商捷克斯洛伐克集团公司（Czechoslovak Group AS）已增加了更多的银行参与其潜在的首次公开募股工作，可能会募集到 30 亿欧元（35 亿美元）或更多资金。【原文：Defense manufacturer Czechoslovak Group AS has added more banks to work on its potential initial public offering that could raise €3 billion ($3.5 billion) or more, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 工厂受到冲击，俄罗斯燃料运输量下滑，国内需求成为优先事项
item.description: 在乌克兰无人机对炼油厂的袭击不断升级导致产量减少、生产商优先考虑国内市场之后，俄罗斯石油产品出口降至战时最低水平。【原文：Russian oil product exports dropped to a wartime low after escalating Ukrainian drone strikes on refineries reduced output and producers prioritized the home market.】

item.title: 阿布扎比和迪拜为数十亿美元的 EGA 上市向银行求助
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，阿联酋全球铝业公司（Emirates Global Aluminium PJSC）已选定银行安排可能的首次公开募股，这可能是中东地区最大的上市活动之一。【原文：Emirates Global Aluminium PJSC has picked banks to arrange a potential initial public offering, according to people familiar with the matter, in what could be one of the largest listings in the Middle East.】

item.title: 与日本 SMBC 达成协议后，印度 Yes 银行开始进军财富管理领域
item.description: 在与日本三井住友银行（Sumitomo Mitsui Banking Corp.【原文：Indian private lender Yes Bank Ltd. is exploring entering the country’s booming wealth management space following its strategic partnership with Japan’s Sumitomo Mitsui Banking Corp.】

item.title: 这会伤害我们"：特朗普下令停止海上风电项目，1.5 万个工作岗位岌岌可危
item.description: 塞萨尔-利马（Cesar Lima）从未考虑过海上风电的政治问题。大多数时候，这位铁工专注于在 15 英里外的海面上工作，攀爬涡轮机，观看海豚从罗德岛海岸附近的船上滑过。【原文：Cesar Lima never gave much thought to the politics of offshore wind. Most days, the ironworker focused on his shift 15 miles out at sea, climbing turbines and watching dolphins gliding past his vessel off the coast of Rhode Island.】

item.title: 零售业反弹，加拿大消费者在贸易战中保持韧性
item.description: 加拿大零售业上个月取得了相对健康的增长，弥补了自 2022 年以来第三季度最糟糕的开局。【原文：Canadian retail sales made up for the worst start to a third quarter since 2022 with a relatively healthy gain last month.】

item.title: 住房需求下降，木材关税未能阻止价格下滑
item.description: 今年早些时候，特朗普政府将加拿大软木木材的进口费用提高了一倍多，其目的是支持国内价格，促进美国生产。但结果却是价格暴跌，边境两侧的木材厂都在缩减规模。【原文：When the Trump administration more than doubled import fees on Canadian softwood lumber earlier this year, the goal was to support domestic prices and boost US production. Instead, prices have plunged, and mills on both sides of the border are scaling back.】

item.title: 阿波罗与施罗德商谈私募市场合作事宜
item.description: 阿波罗全球管理公司（Apollo Global Management Inc.【原文：Apollo Global Management Inc. is in early talks with Schroders Plc to form a potential product partnership that could see the private capital giant source assets for the UK’s largest standalone money manager.】

item.title: 抵押债券在现金充裕的房地产投资信托基金中找到了现成的买家
item.description: 抵押房地产投资信托基金正在抢购由美国住房贷款支持的债券，抢购速度之快是大流行病爆发前所未见的，它们利用相对便宜的估值和自身股票的反弹帮助筹集了新的现金。【原文：Mortgage REITs are snapping up bonds backed by US home loans at a pace last seen before the pandemic, taking advantage of relatively cheap valuations and rallies in their own shares that helped them raise fresh cash.】

item.title: 布拉德称本周不会支持 50 个基点
item.description: 前圣路易斯联邦储备银行行长詹姆斯-布拉德（James Bullard）是美国央行下一任主席的候选人之一，他表示，他不会支持本周降息50个基点。【原文：Former Federal Reserve Bank of St. Louis President James Bullard, who is in the running to be the next chair of the US central bank, said that he wouldn’t have backed a 50 basis point interest-rate cut this week.】

item.title: 路威酩轩集团（LVMH）解雇高管，举报人索赔 200 万美元
item.description: 一名被解雇的路威酩轩集团高管被指控行为不当，包括对一名同事竖中指，他正在起诉酩悦轩尼诗公司，要求赔偿170万欧元（200万美元），并称他被解雇的真正原因是他对俄罗斯的销售违反了制裁规定，而不是他的管理风格。【原文：A fired LVMH executive — accused of misconduct including giving a colleague the middle finger — is suing Moët Hennessy for €1.7 million ($2 million), saying he was really ousted for flagging sanctions-busting sales to Russia, not his management style.】

item.title: 布鲁克蒙特准备 "补贴 "陷入困境的巨灾债券 ETF
item.description: 布鲁克蒙特资本管理公司（Brookmont Capital Management）准备用自己的资金来支持世界上第一只以巨灾债券为基础的交易所交易基金，因为投资者对他们将在价值 12.6 万亿美元的 ETF 市场上接受的资产种类划定了界限。【原文：Brookmont Capital Management is ready to use its own money to prop up the world’s first exchange-traded fund built on catastrophe bonds, as investors draw the line on the kinds of assets they’ll embrace in the $12.6 trillion ETF market.】

item.title: 荷兰养老金延迟给 "拥挤 "的债券市场交易带来风险
item.description: 据法国兴业银行（Societe Generale SA）称，荷兰养老基金推迟向一套新规则过渡，给债券市场最受欢迎的交易之一带来了风险。【原文：Dutch pension funds delaying their transition to a new set of rules pose a risk to one of the bond market’s favorite trades, according to Societe Generale SA.】

item.title: 花旗集团称去美元化说法是 "幻觉
item.description: 花旗集团的分析师们驳斥了全球投资者正在寻求减少对美元依赖的观点，认为去美元化的说法是一种 "海市蜃楼"，没有经济数据的支持。【原文：Citigroup Inc. analysts have dismissed the idea that global investors are seeking to reduce their reliance on the dollar, describing the de-dollarization narrative as a “mirage” that’s not supported by economic data.】

item.title: 诺巴银行支持者寻求从斯德哥尔摩首次公开募股中获得高达 8.1 亿美元的资金
item.description: 诺巴银行集团（NOBA Bank Group AB）的股东希望在该公司的斯德哥尔摩首次公开募股中筹集高达 76 亿瑞典克朗（约合 8.1 亿美元）的资金，为欧洲一连串大规模的新股发行添砖加瓦。【原文：NOBA Bank Group AB’s shareholders are looking to raise as much as 7.6 billion Swedish kronor ($810 million) in the firm’s Stockholm initial public offering, adding to a string of substantial new issuances in Europe.】

item.title: 水危机笼罩约翰内斯堡，市长吹捧新战略
item.description: 约翰内斯堡市长告诉南非立法者，他的政府已经提高了修复城市供水基础设施的预算，并在居民抗议供水不足的几天后加快实施一项扭转局面的计划。【原文：Johannesburg’s mayor told South African lawmakers that his administration has raised the budget for fixing the city’s water infrastructure and is accelerating a turnaround plan days after residents protested against lack of supply.】

item.title: 全球液化天然气激增促使欧洲提前退出俄罗斯供应
item.description:
该集团正在考虑将退出莫斯科油轮运输天然气的时间提前一年。【原文：

The bloc is considering accelerating its exit from Moscow’s tanker-borne gas by a year.

】

item.title: Frigoglass 正在洽谈出售尼日利亚业务，以偿还债务
item.description: 总部位于英国的饮料冷却器制造商 Frigoglass 集团正在洽谈出售其尼日利亚业务，该公司是非洲最大的玻璃容器生产商，希望在即将到期的债务之前筹集现金。【原文：Frigoglass Group, the UK-based manufacturer of beverage coolers, is in talks to sell its Nigerian business, Africa’s largest glass container producer, as it looks to raise cash ahead of looming debt maturities.】

item.title: 我曾是个古怪的孩子少年黑客的狱中自白
item.description:
诺亚-乌尔班（Noah Urban）在臭名昭著的 "散蜘蛛"（Scattered Spider）团伙中扮演的角色是劝说人们在不知情的情况下让罪犯访问敏感的计算机系统。【原文：

Noah Urban’s role in the notorious Scattered Spider gang was talking people into unwittingly giving criminals access to sensitive computer systems.

】

item.title: 日本央行减持 ETF 对日本意味着什么？
item.description: 日本央行计划开始平仓其持有的交易所交易基金，这一过程可能需要一个多世纪才能完成。根据摩根士丹利 MUFG 策略师的计算，截至 9 月中旬，日本央行持有的 ETF 市值约为 79.5 万亿日元（约合 5370 亿美元），未实现收益约为 43.8 万亿日元。【原文：The Bank of Japan plans to start unwinding its exchange-traded fund holdings, in a process that could take more than a century to complete. As of mid-September, the BOJ held about ¥79.5 trillion ($537 billion) of ETFs by market value and had around ¥43.8 trillion of unrealized gains, according to calculations by Morgan Stanley MUFG strategists.】

item.title: 穆勒称欧洲央行利率具有温和支持性，无需降息
item.description: 欧洲中央银行理事会成员马迪斯-穆勒（Madis Muller）表示，欧洲中央银行正在实施略微宽松的货币政策，目前没有理由进一步降低借贷成本。【原文：The European Central Bank is running a slightly accommodative monetary policy and currently has no reason to lower borrowing costs any further, according to Governing Council member Madis Muller.】

item.title: 据说 Glencore 正在就出售刚果重要铜矿进行谈判
item.description: Glencore Plc 一直在就出售其最大非洲铜矿的控股权进行谈判，这是迄今为止最明显的迹象，表明这家大宗商品贸易商愿意放弃对其旗舰资产之一的控制权。【原文：Glencore Plc has been holding talks about selling a controlling stake in its biggest African copper mine, in the clearest sign yet that the commodity trader is open to relinquishing control of one of its flagship assets.】

item.title: 初创企业依靠曾经罕见的股票销售留住人才
item.description: 欢迎收看 Tech In Depth，这是彭博社全球记者关于科技商业的每日时事通讯。今天，凯特-克拉克（Kate Clark）将探讨初创企业越来越多地使用二级股票销售作为留住优秀员工的一种方式。【原文：Welcome to Tech In Depth, our daily newsletter about the business of tech from Bloomberg’s journalists around the world. Today, Kate Clark looks at the increasing use of secondary share sales by startups as a way to retain their talented employees.】

item.description:

item.title: 美联储卡什卡利认为，鉴于招聘放缓，2025 年美联储将再削减两次薪资
item.description: 明尼阿波利斯联邦储备银行行长尼尔-卡什卡利（Neel Kashkari）表示，他支持美国央行本周降息的决定，并计划今年再降息两次。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of Minneapolis President Neel Kashkari said he supported the US central bank’s decision to lower interest rates this week and penciled in two additional cuts this year.】
